graphql.query:
mutation ($payload:NotificationCreateInboxInput!)
{
	notificationCreateInbox (payload:$payload)
	{
		id
		tenantIds
		notificationId
		sort
		accountId
		accountCode
		isImportant
		subject
		body
		attachments
		isRead
		isReadAtLeastOnce
		meta
	}
}

graphql.query:
query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	notificationGetInboxes (query: $query)
	{
		id
		tenantIds
		sort
		accountId
		accountCode
		isImportant
		subject
		body
		attachments
		isRead
		isReadAtLeastOnce
		meta
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	notificationFindInbox (query: $query)
	{
		id
		tenantIds
		sort
		accountId
		accountCode
		isImportant
		subject
		body
		attachments
		isRead
		isReadAtLeastOnce
		meta
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($id:ID)
{
	notificationFindInboxById (id:$id)
	{
		id
		tenantIds
		sort
		accountId
		accountCode
		isImportant
		subject
		body
		attachments
		isRead
		isReadAtLeastOnce
		meta
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($payload:NotificationUpdateInboxInput!)
{
	notificationUpdateInbox (payload:$payload)
	{
		id
		tenantIds
		sort
		accountId
		accountCode
		isImportant
		subject
		body
		attachments
		isRead
		isReadAtLeastOnce
		meta
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($id:ID!)
{
	notificationDeleteInboxById (id:$id)
